brim.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the bottom part of a hat that sticks out to protect you from sun and rain
brim.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: an old straw hat with a broad brim
brim.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the top edge of a container
brim.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: She filled each glass to the brim.
The cup was filled to the brim with coffee.
brim.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: if your eyes brim with tears, or if tears brim from your eyes, you start to cry
brim.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Her tears brimmed over again as she started to speak.
